info.name: youtube - firefox performance fix
info.additionalInfo:
Reddit user caspy7 has found a fix for Firefox users with a large number of subscriptions that may experience poor performance when using Youtube.com in Firefox.

Reddit post:
https://www.reddit.com/r/firefox/comments/3zmu55/poor_performance_when_youtube_is_open_it_may_be/

Bug report:
https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1220502
